title: Transitioning to the New Client (Megathread): Troubleshooting Issues
body:
Hey guys!

With the rollout of [Phase 2](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-client-rollout-phase-2) we're getting a lot of questions and issues about the new client. So to save our time and yours, we ask that you try **ALL** of these general troubleshooting tips before making a post.

**Enable Low Spec Mode**
This should fix any laggy champion selects, freezing clients and crashing clients.

+ Click the little gear in the top right hand corner, and then check the "Enable Low Spec Mode" box.
http://i.imgur.com/X485cWo.png

**Enable Close client during game**
This should fix in-game FPS drops that you might be getting after upgrading to the new client. Be warned though, this setting will make the end game screen take a while to load.

+ Click the little gear in the top right hand corner, and then check the "Close client during game" box.
http://i.imgur.com/MjCsNNZ.png

**Disable Sound**
This might fix performance issues if you have a potato PC.

+ Click the little gear in the top right hand corner, select the sound tab, then uncheck the "Enable Sound" box.
http://i.imgur.com/bUS0ukB.png

**Initiate Full Repair**
If you're still having issues, try this.

+ Click the little gear in the top right hand corner, and then click the "Initiate Full Repair" button.
http://i.imgur.com/0MbyrfN.png

If you've tried all that and are still having issues, then make a quick post detailing your issue and we'll get on to it as soon as we can :D

Try this:

1. Open Internet Explorer
2. Click on the Cog in the top-right hand corner, and open Internet Options
3. Go to the Connections tab, and select "LAN settings" at the bottom
4. Ensure that "Automatically detect settings" is checked, and that the "Use a proxy server [...]" option is not checked. 

If you didn't need to change anything, go to the "Advanced" tab and click "Reset..." under "Reset Internet Explorer settings".
